title: Ethereum edges into top 50 global assets while Bitcoin climbs to 12th largest asset worldwide by market cap
description:
Quick Take Ethereum has reached a significant achievement by cracking into the top 50 global assets based on market capitalization, with a current worth of $223 billion. This pushes it past palladium and brings it to just $17 billion behind platinum, indicating a notable surge among global assets. Bitcoin also retains a substantial rank as […]

The post Ethereum edges into top 50 global assets while Bitcoin climbs to 12th largest asset worldwide by market cap appeared first on CryptoSlate.
